title: User login page fails to load after recent update
description: After the recent update to the application, the user login page fails to load, causing users to be unable to access their accounts. This issue needs immediate attention.

title: Error message displayed for invalid email format is unclear
description: The error message shown when an invalid email format is entered is not user-friendly and lacks clarity. It needs to be revised to provide more specific guidance to the users.

title: Application crashes when submitting the feedback form
description: Submitting the feedback form on the application causes it to crash unexpectedly. This issue prevents users from providing feedback and needs to be resolved urgently.

title: Navigation menu disappears on mobile view in Safari
description: In the mobile view of Safari, the navigation menu disappears, preventing users from accessing different sections of the site. This bug needs fixing to ensure usability.

title: Password reset link does not work after password change
description: After changing the password, the password reset link sent to users is no longer functional. This issue could affect user experience and needs immediate resolution.

title: Error in calculation of discount on checkout page
description: The checkout page is not calculating discounts correctly, which results in incorrect final pricing. This issue needs urgent attention to ensure accurate billing.

title: App freezes when uploading large files
description: When users attempt to upload large files, the application freezes and becomes unresponsive. This bug affects user experience and should be fixed as soon as possible.

title: Broken links on the contact page
description: Several links on the contact page are broken and lead to 404 errors. These links need to be fixed to ensure users can access the intended information.

title: Search bar does not display autocomplete suggestions
description: The search bar is not providing autocomplete suggestions as users type their queries. This bug impacts the usability and efficiency of the search function.

title: Database connection errors during peak hours
description: During peak usage hours, users experience database connection errors which disrupt the service. This issue needs to be addressed to improve system reliability.

title: Broken image links on the homepage
description: The homepage has several broken image links that are not displaying the intended visuals. This affects the aesthetics of the homepage and should be fixed.

title: Incorrect timezone display in user profile settings
description: The timezone displayed in user profile settings is incorrect, leading to confusion about the actual time zone. This needs correction for accurate user information.

title: Email notifications are not sent for new messages
description: Users are not receiving email notifications for new messages, which impacts communication. This issue needs to be resolved to ensure timely notifications.

title: Error in data export functionality for reports
description: The data export functionality for generating reports is not working correctly, causing errors during export. This bug needs to be fixed to ensure proper report generation.

title: Mobile app crashes on startup after update
description: After the latest update, the mobile app crashes immediately on startup. This issue prevents users from using the app and requires urgent resolution.

title: Form validation fails for special characters in input
description: The form validation does not handle special characters correctly, leading to input errors. This needs fixing to ensure proper form submission.

title: Dashboard widgets fail to load data after refresh
description: Widgets on the dashboard fail to load data after a page refresh, causing users to see outdated or missing information. This needs to be addressed to maintain data accuracy.

title: Error handling in checkout process is inconsistent
description: The error handling during the checkout process is inconsistent, leading to confusion and potential loss of sales. This should be standardized for a better user experience.
